abstract: Internal Revenue Service issues warning to people who voluntarily forgo health insurance, specifically illegal immigrants with limited English proficiency, due to growing trend of tax prepares who request health law penalties be paid to them and instead pocket money; IRS recommends payments be made through tax return or by letter to IRS.

headline.print_headline: Tax Scams Are Targeting Uninsured, I.R.S. Warns
headline.main: Tax Scams Are Targeting Uninsured, I.R.S. Warns

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

snippet: In some cases, the agency said, unscrupulous tax preparers tell clients to pay the penalties for not having health insurance directly to them, and then keep the money.
lead_paragraph: In some cases, the agency said, unscrupulous tax preparers tell clients to pay the penalties for not having health insurance directly to them, and then keep the money.
